### Chemical Analytical Services for Graphite Samples
#### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

**Reference:** PW-23-01031188

**Amendment:** 1

**Solicitation Number:** NRCan-500073579

*Published on* March 30, 2023
*Closes on* May 5, 2023, at 4 PM EDT

### Overview

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites qualified Offerors to submit their responses to this Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Chemical Analytical Services for Graphite Samples. The services sought will involve the analysis of solid samples containing carbon in the form of graphite and other forms of carbon (coke, etc.) on an as-and-when-required basis.

### Key Details

* **Scope of Work:** This RFSO requires Offerors to provide analytical services for solid samples containing carbon in the form of graphite and other forms of carbon (coke, etc.).
* **Timeline:** The Standing Offer will be for a one-year period with three (3) option periods of one year, under the same terms and conditions.
* **Trade Agreements:** This procurement is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and several other bilateral and multilateral agreements.
* **Regions of Opportunity:** This procurement is open to bidders from Canada.
* **Regions of Delivery:** The services are expected to be delivered in Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Request for Standing Offer

NRCan intends to award one (1) Standing Offer. Offerors are encouraged to submit their responses to this RFSO by May 5, 2023, at 4:00 PM EDT. Responses must be submitted electronically through Merx.
